name: Witch Sword
description: Witch Sword is a story driven, indie RPG. The game takes place in a dark, medieval style fantasy world. The player will play as a swordsman and begin an adventure to unveil a conspiracy to overthrow an empire, and to take part in a deadly contest for a powerful ancient artifact.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 ,or newer Processor: Intel i3 2100 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTS450 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible
